objects.description: [RDAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0495) can process steganographic images attached to email messages to send and receive C2 commands. [RDAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0495) can also embed additional messages within BMP images to communicate with the [RDAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0495) operator.(Citation: Unit42 RDAT July 2020)

external_references.description: Falcone, R. (2020, July 22). OilRig Targets Middle Eastern Telecommunications Organization and Adds Novel C2 Channel with Steganography to Its Inventory. Retrieved July 28, 2020.
